name: @vantage-lane/admin
description: Admin dashboard for Vantage Lane ride-hailing platform

scripts.rules:file-sizes: find apps -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l | awk '$1 > 200 {print "âŒ " $1 " lines: " $2}'
scripts.quality:check: npm run guard:app-logic && npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run check:ts
scripts.quality:fix: npm run format && npm run lint --fix
scripts.ci:gates: echo 'ðŸš§ Running CI BLOCKERS (must pass)...' && npm run ci:blockers && echo 'ðŸŸ¡ Running CI WARNINGS (tracking)...' && npm run ci:warnings
scripts.ci:blockers: npm run check:ts && npm run lint:blockers && npm run lint:css:blockers && npm run test:minimal && npm run build
scripts.ci:warnings: npm run lint:warnings && npm run rules:tracking-summary
scripts.lighthouse:check: echo 'TODO: Add LHCI with >90 performance score'
scripts.rules:tracking-summary: echo 'ðŸ“Š RULES.md Compliance Tracking (warnings):' && echo 'Any types:' && npm run rules:any-types | wc -l && echo 'Large files:' && npm run rules:file-sizes | wc -l && echo 'Console logs:' && npm run rules:console-logs && echo 'Hardcoded colors:' && npm run rules:hardcoded-colors && echo 'Hardcoded px:' && npm run rules:hardcoded-px && echo 'Inline functions:' && npm run rules:inline-functions
scripts.check:all: mkdir -p reports && (tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | tee reports/tsc.log); (eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx -f unix 2>&1 | tee reports/eslint.log); (next build 2>&1 | tee reports/next-build.log)
scripts.check:enterprise: npm run check:boundaries && npm run check:files && npm run check:colors && npm run check:business
scripts.check:files: find apps/admin -name '*.tsx' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -exec wc -l {} \; | awk '$1>200{print "UI too long: "$2" ("$1" lines)"}' || true
scripts.check:colors: grep -R 'color:\s*#\|rgb(\|hsl(' apps/admin app --include='*.css' --include='*.tsx' -n || echo 'No inline colors found'
scripts.check:business: grep -R 'from.*shared/api/clients\|fetch(\|axios(\|supabase\.from(' app --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' -n || echo 'No business logic in UI'
scripts.check:any: grep -R '\bany\b' apps/admin/shared/ui app/login --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -n || echo 'No any types found'
scripts.check:advanced: npm run check:quality && npm run check:duplicates && npm run check:deadcode && npm run check:performance
scripts.security:full: npm run security:validate && npm run security:rls
scripts.check:env: tsx scripts/check-env.ts || echo 'âš ï¸ check-env.ts not implemented yet'
scripts.check:secrets: git secrets --scan 2>/dev/null || echo 'âš ï¸ git-secrets not installed (brew install git-secrets)'
scripts.check:bundle: node scripts/check-bundle.js || echo 'âš ï¸ check-bundle.js not implemented yet'
scripts.precommit: npm run test:run && npm run check:ts && npm run lint && npm run guard:app-logic
